Value:

if(columns) \
    { \
        while(col>=columns->length()) columns->add(0); \
        int w = TABALIGN(x) - colx; \
        w = max(w, (*columns)[col]); \
        (*columns)[col] = w; \
        col++; \
        colx += w; \
        x = colx; \
    } \
    else x = TABALIGN(x);
